description:
HEAD OF MARKETING AND CUSTOMER ANALYTICS

REMOTE (USA)

$180,000 - $220,000

This leading global FinTech company is looking for a Head of Marketing and Customer Analytics to lead the marketing team's growth initiatives. This individual will be in a highly visible leadership role leading the MarTech, Customer Analytics, and Campaign Analytics teams. They will also have the opportunity to help double the size of the current team.

Key Responsibilities:
• Lead marketing attribution efforts, leveraging digital channels and various pipelines to track and optimize marketing performance across our app-first platform.
• Oversee campaign analytics, providing insights in the effectiveness of ad hoc & brand campaigns.
• Drive a test-and-learn approach for continuous improvement.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to build and optimize MarTech stack, enabling data-driven decision-making and personalized customer experiences.
• Drive customer analytics initiatives to understand customer behavior, retention, and lifetime value.
• Identify opportunities to enhance customer engagement and satisfaction.
• Take a lead role in establishing a leadership presence within the team.
• Guide strategic direction, and foster a culture of innovation and continuous improvement!

Your Skills/Experience:
• 10+ years of analytics and marketing experience
• Experience in app-first or DTC environments, with a proven track record of driving marketing analytics and customer insights in high-growth segments.
• Experience building and scaling analytics frameworks
• Strong analytical skills and experience with marketing attribution, campaign analytics, and customer analytics tools and methodologies.
• Demonstrated leadership and communication skills, with the ability to influence senior stakeholders and drive organizational change.
• Proficient in leading customer data science practices, including segmentation, churn, and predictive insights.
• Prior experience in building and leading high-performing analytics teams, with a focus on coaching and mentorship.

Must be authorized to work in the US now and in the future.
